titleStmt.title: The doting doctor, or, The icarion preacher calculated for the better instruction of King Blake of Coven-Garden, representing the meridian of his dunghill embassie where the pole is elevated many degrees beyond the manners of the King the author / by N.E. Gent.
titleStmt.author: N. E., Gent.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
